title: [FS2004] [FSX] [P3D] PILOT'S - FS Global 2010 R3 FTX Update
description:
Compatible with: FSX, P3D and P3Dv2

Spanish/Englih Help Files (no Russian Version)


Instructions: 


1-To install the FS Global installers properly use the new installers of the folder "New Installers". The previous step must be applied to FSX and also P3D/P3Dv2. Download the last installer to install it properly.

2-Now you can add the updates of FSX

3-FTX: Copy the contents from the "FSGX2010" folder:


Updates / Updates for FTX / FSGX2010 

To the folder that contains the global (already installed), ie, in the directory where you installed it.
